hanzi-su-wiki:
復

Значения

Опять, снова; возвращаться; периодически

Мнемоника

  • Искажено. Идти 彳 повторно 复, т.е. возвращаться.

  • "Люди периодически ходят по той же самой дороге каждый день 日."

Варианты

复
purpleculture_pinyin:
fù
to go and return; to return; to resume; to return to a normal or original state; to repeat; again; to recover; to restore; to turn over; to reply; to answer; to reply to a letter; to retaliate; to carry out
пойти и вернуться; возвращаться; возобновить; вернуться в нормальное или исходное состояние; повторять; опять таки; выздороветь; для восстановления; переворачивать; ответить; отвечать; ответить на письмо; нанести ответный удар; выполнять
rtega_mnemonic:
復復RS
复复		return, repeat, repeatedly
  • person 𠂉 (coming 彳) and coming 夂 repeatedly during a day 日: he keeps on returning
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 复)
Synonym: 雙
Antonyms: 單
Ideographic: Older form of 复; see that character for the etymology
purpleculture_examples:
複雜 [ fù zá ]: complicated; complex
復興 [ fù xīng ]: Fuxing district of Handan city 邯郸市 , north Taiwan
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 彳 [ chì ] to step with the left foot
    • 复 [ fù ] again, repeatedly; copy, duplicate; to restore, to return
heisig_chinese_memo: Before going all the way to the Boss with your queue of companions in a Final Fantasy game, you should probably double back to save at a restore point and recover.
heisig_constituent: restore, Nelson, column, going, line, fold back, double back, reclining, lying down, sun, day, walking legs
koohiiStory1: Before going all the way to the Boss in a Final Fantasy game, you should probably double back to save at a restore point.
koohiiStory2: The column of soldiers has to double back to restore the peace in the village they just left.
jp_example_words:
復旧(ふくきゅう): restoration, restitution, rehabilitation
復活(ふっかつ): revival (e.g. musical), restoration
復興(ふっこう): revival, renaissance, reconstruction
往復(おうふく): round trip, coming and going, return ticket
回復(かいふく): recovery (from illness), improvement, rehabilitation, restoration
復習(ふくしゅう): review
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You loiter around a black hole, waiting for it to finish destroying and switch to restore mode. You were told all black holes finish eventually, and when they do you can press a button to restore everything back to the way it was.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine loitering around near (but not too near!) the black hole waiting for it finish so you can restore the galaxy.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Finally there's nothing else for the black hole to eat so you hit the restore button.... but nothing happens. "Oh f**k (ふく) you!" you scream as you realize you were lied to.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Maybe if you yell f**k you enough things will be restored. Ha. No. Everything's gone and it's your fault for being gullible.
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 副 (フク вспомогательный), 福 (フク счастье), 幅 (はば、フク ширина).
Ru_Radicals: 一 (один), ノ, 夂 (зима), 彳 (шаг), 日 (день)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the step (彳) that makes a man go all day (复) is the return
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: For many people each day is a duplicate of the previous one - walk to work with your walking legs and then lie down and rest them with some sleep.
humanum_full_description_en:
The original meaning of " Fu " is back and forth, back and forth. Bronze inscription from "彳", " re " sound, or from "辵". " Fu " means to walk in and out of the earth room (a cave dwelling place). The original meaning is to go in and out (Chen Yongzheng, Xu Zhongshu), come back, and then add from "彳" or "辵" to mean walking. The extension is repeated, repeated, and repeated. "Shuowen": "Return, come and go. From Yi, return to sound." Duan Yucai's note: "<Roubu> said: Return, return. Return, return. All training goes and still comes.

Zhang Risheng believes that " complex " resembles the shape of two beans, in which the food in the beans is overturned from one to the other, so there is a sense of repetition. Can prepare a word.

Chen Banghuai believes that the form of the character " Fu " in the bronze inscription is similar to that of " 𩫖 " (see " City " for the shape of " 𩫖 "). Warring States bamboo ' re part of the "word like dirt chamber rewritten as" unitary "" unitary "is" complex "sound character.

The inscriptions in gold mean return and return, and are used synonymously with " return ". Xiaochen [言逨] 簋: "Yu Jue return"; means to return and pay, 曶 Ding: "effect [father] Bei (俾) rejuvenation silk bundle "; also used as" cover "this means destruction, Zhongshan Wang Ding:" five years of complex (cover) Wu ", refers to the Conquest of Wu Yue Ju Jian things. Said again, again, Zhongshan King Yuanhu: "The virtue of the first king, Fuke can regain it." It is also used as a name.

The Bamboo Slips of the Warring States Period expressed their return, "Tsinghua Slips II. "Lian Year" Jian 47: "Qin 𠂤 (division) Naifu", indicating that the Qin army returned. He also replied, "Guodian Jane. "Lao Zi Jia" Jane 1: "Absolutely abandon hypocrisy and deceive, and reunite (filial piety) and son (kindness)." It means that by giving up hypocrisy and deceit, people can restore their filial nature.
humanum_short_description_en: Synopsis: The inscription " Fu " means that the toes go in and out of the earth room (the cave dwelling place). The original meaning is to go back and forth. The extension is repeated, repeated, and repeated.
humanum_full_description:
「復」的本義是來回、往返。金文從「彳」，「复」聲，或從「辵」。「复」會足趾從土室(穴居之處)進出之意，本義是進出往來(陳永正、徐中舒)、回來，後加從「彳」或「辵」以表行走之意。引申為反復、再、又。《說文》：「復，往來也。从彳，复聲。」段玉裁注：「〈辵部〉曰：返，還也。還，復也。皆訓往而仍來。

　　張日昇則認為「复」象二豆相合之形，豆中食物由一器傾覆至另一器，故有往來反覆之意。可備一說。

　　陳邦懷認為金文「復」字所從與「𩫖」形近(「𩫖」字字形參見「城」字)。戰國竹簡「復」字象土室的部分改寫為「酉」，「酉」是「復」的聲符。

　　金文表示歸來、返回，與「歸」同義連用，小臣[言逨]簋：「雩厥復歸」；表示退還、還付，曶鼎：「效[父則]卑(俾)復厥絲束」；又用為「覆」，表示覆滅，中山王鼎：「五年復(覆)吳」，指越王句踐滅吳之事。表示再、又，中山王圓壺：「先王之德，弗可復得。」又用作人名。

　　戰國竹簡表示返回，《清華簡二．繫年》簡47：「秦𠂤(師)乃復」，表示秦國的軍隊於是返回。又表示回復，《郭店簡．老子甲》簡1：「絕偽棄詐，民復季(孝)子(慈)。」意謂放棄虛偽、欺詐，人民可以恢復孝慈的天性。
humanum_short_description: 金文「復」會足趾從土室(穴居之處)進出之意，本義是往返、來回。引申為反復、再、又。

①回去，返：反覆。往復。
②回答，回報：覆命。覆信。復仇。
③還原，使如前：復舊。復婚。復職。光復。復辟。
④再，重來：複習。複診。複審。復現。複議。
⑤許多的，不是單一的：重(chóng)復。繁複。複雜。複姓。

「 復 」的本義是來回、往返。金文從「 彳 」，「 复 」聲，或從「 辵 」。「 复 」會足趾從土室(穴居之處)進出之意，本義是進出往來(陳永正、徐中舒)、回來，後加從「 彳 」或「 辵 」以表行走之意。引申為反復、再、又。《說文》：「復，往來也。从彳，复聲。」段玉裁注：「〈辵部〉曰：返，還也。還，復也。皆訓往而仍來。 張日昇則認為「 复 」象二豆相合之形，豆中食物由一器傾覆至另一器，故有往來反覆之意。可備一說。 陳邦懷認為金文「 復 」字所從與「 𩫖 」形近(「 𩫖 」字字形參見「 城 」字)。戰國竹簡「 復 」字象土室的部分改寫為「 酉 」，「 酉 」是「 復 」的聲符。 金文表示歸來、返回，與「 歸 」同義連用，小臣[言逨]簋：「雩厥復歸」；表示退還、還付，曶鼎：「效[父則]卑(俾)復厥絲束」；又用為「 覆 」，表示覆滅，中山王鼎：「五年復(覆)吳」，指越王句踐滅吳之事。表示再、又，中山王圓壺：「先王之德，弗可復得。」又用作人名。 戰國竹簡表示返回，《清華簡二．繫年》簡47：「秦𠂤(師)乃復」，表示秦國的軍隊於是返回。又表示回復，《郭店簡．老子甲》簡1：「絕偽棄詐，民復季(孝)子(慈)。」意謂放棄虛偽、欺詐，人民可以恢復孝慈的天性。

The original meaning is to go in and out (Chen Yongzheng, Xu Zhongshu), come back, and then add from " 彳" or " 辵" to mean walking. The extension is repeated, repeated, and repeated. "Shuowen": "Return, come and go. From Yi, return to sound." Duan Yucai's note: " said: Return, return. Return, return. All training goes and still comes. Zhang Risheng believes that " complex" resembles the shape of two beans, in which the food in the beans is overturned from one to the other, so there is a sense of repetition. Can prepare a word. Chen Banghuai believes that the form of the character " Fu" in the bronze inscription is similar to that of " 𩫖" (see " City" for the shape of " 𩫖"). Warring States bamboo ' re part of the "word like dirt chamber rewritten as" unitary"" unitary"is" complex"sound character. Xiaochen [言逨] 簋: "Yu Jue return"; means to return and pay, 曶 Ding: "effect [father] Bei (俾) rejuvenation silk bundle "; also used as" cover"this means destruction, Zhongshan Wang Ding:" five years of complex (cover) Wu ", refers to the Conquest of Wu Yue Ju Jian things. 復字的基本解释

復
fù
见“复”①復④⑥。

復字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fù］
［《廣韻》房六切，入屋，奉。］
［《廣韻》扶富切，去宥，奉。］
“复1”的繁体字。
(1)还，返回。
(2)抵偿；偿还。
(3)谓归还。参见“復政”。
(4)恢复；康复。
(5)收复；光复。
(6)重复；反复；回环。
(7)告诉；回答；回复。
(8)又；更；再。
(9)报复。
(10)谓实践诺言。
(11)谓免除徭役或赋税。
(12)泛指消除。
(13)古丧礼称召唤始死者的灵魂为“復”。
(14)通“覆”。庇护；覆盖。
(15)通“覆”。倾覆；颠覆。
(16)通“”。地室。《诗·大雅·绵》：“古公亶父，陶復陶穴，未有家室。”復，《说文·穴部》引作：“”。《商君书·徕民》：“人之復陰陽澤水者過半。”朱师辙解诂：“復借为''，地室也。”一说为开掘於住穴之内的窦窖。参阅于省吾《泽螺居诗经新证·陶复陶穴》。
(17)通“腹”。丰厚。
(18)通“複”。参见“復道”、“復格”。
(19)卦名。六十四卦之一，震下坤上。
(20)姓。春秋楚有

復字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【彳字部】　復； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页369第22
〔古文〕??【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?房六切，音伏。【說文】往來也。【廣韻】返也。【書·舜典】如五器卒乃復。【傳】復，還也。【詩·小雅】言歸思復。　又【韻會】答也。【書·說命】說復于王。　又【韻會】白也。【禮·曲禮】願有復也。　又【韻會】反命也。【周禮·天官】諸臣之復。【註】復，報也，反也。【疏】謂羣臣受王命，使臣行之訖，反報於王也。　又招魂曰復。【禮·檀弓】復盡愛之道也。【註】復謂招魂，庶幾其精氣之反。　又興復。【諸葛亮·出師表】興復漢室，還於舊都。　又姓。【正字通】元有復見心。　又州名。【隋書·地理志】後周置復州，大業初改曰沔州。　又復陶，官名。【左傳·襄三十年】使爲君復陶。【註】復陶，衣服之官也。　又衣名。【左傳·昭十二年】王皮冠秦復陶。【註】秦所遺羽衣也。　又【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?方六切，音福。【集韻】重也。【正韻】反覆也。【易·復卦】反復其道。【詩·小雅】顧我復我。【註】謂迴轉反復之也。　又【正韻】復，除也。【前漢·高帝紀】

Traditional characters for "复1".
(1) Also, return.
(2) Compensation; repayment.
(3) What is called return. See "Reinstatement".
(4) Recovery; rehabilitation.
(5) Recovery; recovery.
(6) Repeat; repeat; loop.
(7) Tell; answer; reply.
(8) Again; more; again.
(9) Retaliation.
(10) It is called practical promise.
(11) Refers to exemption from corvee or tax.
(12) Generally refers to elimination.
(13) The ancient funeral called the summoning of the soul of the first dead as "recovery".
(14) Through "covering". Shelter; cover.
(15) Through "covering". Overturn; subvert.
(16) Through "". Ground room. "Poetry·Daya·Mian": "Ancient father and father, Tao Fu Taoxue, no family." Fu, "Shuowen·Xuebu" quoted as "". "Book of Shang Jun·Laimin": "More than half of people restore yin and yang to moisturize water." Zhu Shizhe explained: "Re-borrowing is'', and the crypt." One said it was the sinus dug in the acupuncture point. cellar. See Yu Xingwu's "New Proof of the Book of Songs of Zeluoju·Tao Futao Point".
(17) Through the "belly". rich.
(18) Through "Fu". See "Fu Dao", "Fu Ge".
(19) Hexagram name. One of the sixty-four hexagrams, shake down and kun up.
(20) Last name. Spring and Autumn

Name meaning
Nothing.
fù
вм. 复

復

Значения

Опять, снова; возвращаться; периодически

Мнемоника

  • Искажено. Идти 彳 повторно 复, т.е. возвращаться.

  • "Люди периодически ходят по той же самой дороге каждый день 日."

Варианты

复

Radicals: 彳, 复  (loiter, black-hole)
Meaning Mnemonic
You loiter around a black hole, waiting for it to finish destroying and switch to restore mode. You were told all black holes finish eventually, and when they do you can press a button to restore everything back to the way it was.
Imagine loitering around near (but not too near!) the black hole waiting for it finish so you can restore the galaxy.
Reading Mnemonic
Finally there's nothing else for the black hole to eat so you hit the restore button.... but nothing happens. "Oh f**k (ふく) you!" you scream as you realize you were lied to.
Maybe if you yell f**k you enough things will be restored. Ha. No. Everything's gone and it's your fault for being gullible.

一 (один), ノ, 夂 (зима), 彳 (шаг), 日 (день)
